enb_long_title: Seventh Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
sentences: This matter was referred by the COP to the SBI, which first took up the matter on Monday, 29 October.
UNFCCC Executive Secretary Cutajar introduced the revised UNFCCC programme budget, produced following SBI's recommendation at SB-14 of a budget for 2002-2003 of US$32.8 million.

Consultations were held on the draft decision and adopted by the SBI on 8 November and by the COP on 9 November, with an amendment inviting Parties to make contributions in the order of US$6.8 million rather than US$6.5 million to support activities relating to 'prompt start' of the CDM.
The decision (FCCC/CP/2001/L.3) approves the programme budget of US$32,837,100 and approves a contingency budget for conference servicing of US$5,661,800.
